Title: Relates to patient counseling before issuing a prescription for a schedule II opioid
Summary: Relates to patient counseling before issuing a prescription for a schedule II opioid; requires practitioners to consult with the patient regarding the quantity of the opioid and the patient's option to fill the prescription in a lesser quantity, and to inform the patient of the risks associated with opiate addiction and document the reason for the prescription.
LawCode: Amd ยง3331, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to patient counseling before issuing a prescription for a schedule II opioid
